Name: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
review: A timeless classic that tackles important social issues with grace and depth.

author: George Orwell
review: A chilling portrayal of a dystopian society, serving as a stark warning against totalitarianism.

Name: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
review: A compelling exploration of the American Dream and its disillusionment.

Name: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
review: A raw and honest portrayal of teenage angst and alienation.

Name: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
review: A delightful romance with sharp social commentary, showcasing Austen's wit and insight.

Name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
review: A captivating tale of magic, friendship, and adventure that appeals to readers of all ages.
